name: blockstack.ts
description: JavaScript / TypeScript library for interacting with Blockstack
author: vsund

scripts.build: yarn run generate-json-interfaces && tsc && cp -r ./src/auth/schema ./dist/auth/schema && cp -r ./src/profile/schema ./dist/profile/schema
scripts.integration-test:
echo '
Welcome to the integration tests!
=================================

The integration tests are doing live requests to assure that the current code
works with the deployed environment. So you are expected to bring an internet
connection and some time.
Also note that they may fail due to issues with your specific environment
that might not affect the real ecosystem.
' && yarn run build && mocha --require ts-node/register 'tests/integrationTests/**/*.spec.ts'
scripts.generate-json-interfaces: cd ./src/auth/schema/ && find ./ -name "*.json" -exec json2ts --style.useTabs --style.singleQuote --input {} --output {}.d.ts \; && cd - && cd ./src/profile/schema/ && find ./ -name "*.json" -exec json2ts --style.useTabs --style.singleQuote --input {} --output {}.d.ts \; && cd -
